name: Aesthir Glider
oracle_text:
Flying
Aesthir Glider can't block.
flavor_text:
"Sacrilege! A noble ally in life, made nothing more than a glorified kite in death!"
—Arna Kennerüd, skycaptain

name: Alaborn Musketeer
oracle_text: Reach (This creature can block creatures with flying.)
flavor_text: Muskets gave the Alaborn army an advantage it had long lacked—air defense.

name: Alaborn Trooper
flavor_text:
"I dedicate my body to my country And my life to my King."
—Alaborn Soldier's Oath

name: Alluring Scent
oracle_text: All creatures able to block target creature this turn do so.
flavor_text: No earthly armor is protection against this sweetness.

name: Amulet of Kroog
oracle_text: {2}, {T}: Prevent the next 1 damage that would be dealt to any target this turn.
flavor_text: Among the first allies Urza gained were the people of Kroog. As a sign of friendship, Urza gave the healers of the city potent amulets; afterwards, thousands journeyed to Kroog in hope of healing, greatly adding to the city's glory.

name: Argothian Pixies
oracle_text:
Argothian Pixies can't be blocked by artifact creatures.
Prevent all damage that would be dealt to Argothian Pixies by artifact creatures.

name: Artifact Blast
oracle_text: Counter target artifact spell.
flavor_text: The first line of defense against Urza and Mishra, the Artifact Blast achieved widespread fame until an unlucky mage discovered it was useless on the devices the brothers had already created.

name: Bird Maiden
oracle_text: Flying
flavor_text:
"Four things that never meet do here unite
To shed my blood and to ravage my heart,
A radiant brow and tresses that beguile
And rosy cheeks and a glittering smile."
—The Arabian Nights, trans. Haddawy

name: Brass Man
oracle_text:
Brass Man doesn't untap during your untap step.
At the beginning of your upkeep, you may pay {1}. If you do, untap Brass Man.

name: Citanul Druid
oracle_text: Whenever an opponent casts an artifact spell, put a +1/+1 counter on Citanul Druid.

name: Clockwork Swarm
oracle_text:
Clockwork Swarm enters the battlefield with four +1/+0 counters on it.
Clockwork Swarm can't be blocked by Walls.
At end of combat, if Clockwork Swarm attacked or blocked this combat, remove a +1/+0 counter from it.
{X}, {T}: Put up to X +1/+0 counters on Clockwork Swarm. This ability can't cause the total number of +1/+0 counters on Clockwork Swarm to be greater than four. Activate only during your upkeep.

name: Cloud Spirit
oracle_text:
Flying
Cloud Spirit can block only creatures with flying.

name: Counterspell
oracle_text: Counter target spell.

name: Crumble
oracle_text: Destroy target artifact. It can't be regenerated. That artifact's controller gains life equal to its mana value.

name: Cyclopean Mummy
oracle_text: When Cyclopean Mummy dies, exile it.

name: Dark Ritual
oracle_text: Add {B}{B}{B}.

name: Divine Offering
oracle_text: Destroy target artifact. You gain life equal to its mana value.

name: Dragon Engine
oracle_text: {2}: Dragon Engine gets +1/+0 until end of turn.
flavor_text: Those who believed the city of Kroog would never fall to Mishra's forces severely underestimated the might of his war machines.

name: Drowned
oracle_text: {B}: Regenerate Drowned.
flavor_text: We asked Captain Soll what became of the Serafina, but all he said was, "Ships that go down shouldn't come back up."

name: Ebony Horse
oracle_text: {2}, {T}: Untap target attacking creature you control. Prevent all combat damage that would be dealt to and dealt by that creature this turn.

name: Ebony Rhino
oracle_text: Trample
flavor_text:
"That Rhino would fetch us a tidy sum, Joven. Perhaps it's time to make it ours."
—Chandler

name: Elite Cat Warrior
oracle_text: Forestwalk (This creature can't be blocked as long as defending player controls a Forest.)
flavor_text: "Hear that? No? That's a cat warrior."

name: False Summoning
oracle_text: Counter target creature spell.

name: Flying Carpet
oracle_text: {2}, {T}: Target creature gains flying until end of turn.

name: Fog
oracle_text: Prevent all combat damage that would be dealt this turn.

name: Foul Spirit
oracle_text:
Flying
When Foul Spirit enters the battlefield, sacrifice a land.

name: Giant Growth
oracle_text: Target creature gets +3/+3 until end of turn.

name: Giant Tortoise
oracle_text: Giant Tortoise gets +0/+3 as long as it's untapped.

name: Glasses of Urza
oracle_text: {T}: Look at target player's hand.

name: Goblin Bully
flavor_text: It's easy to stand head and shoulders over those with no backbone.

name: Goblin Cavaliers
flavor_text: They get along so well with their goats because they're practically goats themselves.

name: Goblin Caves
oracle_text:
Enchant land
As long as enchanted land is a basic Mountain, Goblin creatures get +0/+2.

name: Goblin Firestarter
oracle_text: Sacrifice Goblin Firestarter: It deals 1 damage to any target. Activate only during your turn, before attackers are declared.

name: Goblin Shrine
oracle_text:
Enchant land
As long as enchanted land is a basic Mountain, Goblin creatures get +1/+0.
When Goblin Shrine leaves the battlefield, it deals 1 damage to each Goblin creature.

name: Gorilla War Cry
oracle_text:
Cast this spell only during combat before blockers are declared.
All creatures gain menace until end of turn. (They can't be blocked except by two or more creatures.)
Draw a card at the beginning of the next turn's upkeep.

name: Gravebind
oracle_text:
Target creature can't be regenerated this turn.
Draw a card at the beginning of the next turn's upkeep.

name: Hasran Ogress
oracle_text: Whenever Hasran Ogress attacks, it deals 3 damage to you unless you pay {2}.

name: Healing Salve
oracle_text:
Choose one —
• Target player gains 3 life.
• Prevent the next 3 damage that would be dealt to any target this turn.

name: Howl from Beyond
oracle_text: Target creature gets +X/+0 until end of turn.

name: Ironhoof Ox
oracle_text: Ironhoof Ox can't be blocked by more than one creature.
flavor_text: The good news is it's vegetarian. The bad news is it just doesn't like you.

name: Just Fate
oracle_text:
Cast this spell only during the declare attackers step and only if you've been attacked this step.
Destroy target attacking creature.

name: Lava Flow
oracle_text: Destroy target creature or land.

name: Library of Leng
oracle_text:
You have no maximum hand size.
If an effect causes you to discard a card, discard it, but you may put it on top of your library instead of into your graveyard.

name: Lim-Dûl's Cohort
oracle_text: Whenever Lim-Dûl's Cohort blocks or becomes blocked by a creature, that creature can't be regenerated this turn.

name: Mightstone
oracle_text: Attacking creatures get +1/+0.
flavor_text: While exploring the sacred cave of Koilos with his brother Mishra and their master Tocasia, Urza fell behind in the Hall of Tagsin, where he discovered the remarkable Mightstone.

name: Oasis
oracle_text: {T}: Prevent the next 1 damage that would be dealt to target creature this turn.

name: Obsianus Golem
flavor_text:
"The foot stone is connected to the ankle stone, the ankle stone is connected to the leg stone . . ."
—"Song of the Artificer"

name: Ogre Taskmaster
oracle_text: Ogre Taskmaster can't block.
flavor_text: Three little goblins, enjoying their brew. One bumped an ogre, and then there were two.

name: Onulet
oracle_text: When Onulet dies, you gain 2 life.
flavor_text: An early inspiration for Urza, Tocasia's Onulets contained magical essences that could be cannibalized after they stopped functioning.

name: Osai Vultures
oracle_text:
Flying
At the beginning of each end step, if a creature died this turn, put a carrion counter on Osai Vultures.
Remove two carrion counters from Osai Vultures: Osai Vultures gets +1/+1 until end of turn.

name: Owl Familiar
oracle_text:
Flying
When Owl Familiar enters the battlefield, draw a card, then discard a card.

name: Phantasmal Forces
oracle_text:
Flying
At the beginning of your upkeep, sacrifice Phantasmal Forces unless you pay {U}.
flavor_text: These beings embody the essence of true heroes long dead. Summoned from the dreamrealms, they rise to meet their enemies.

name: Phantasmal Terrain
oracle_text:
Enchant land
As Phantasmal Terrain enters the battlefield, choose a basic land type.
Enchanted land is the chosen type.

name: Primal Clay
oracle_text: As Primal Clay enters the battlefield, it becomes your choice of a 3/3 artifact creature, a 2/2 artifact creature with flying, or a 1/6 Wall artifact creature with defender in addition to its other types. (A creature with defender can't attack.)

name: Prowling Nightstalker
oracle_text: Prowling Nightstalker can't be blocked except by black creatures.
flavor_text: Silent as a serpent, twisted as a lone bog tree, evil as Tojira's heart.

name: Reconstruction
oracle_text: Return target artifact card from your graveyard to your hand.
flavor_text: Tedious research made the Sages of the College of Lat-Nam adept in repairing broken artifacts.

name: Righteous Charge
oracle_text: Creatures you control get +2/+2 until end of turn.
flavor_text: Bravery shines brightest in a pure soul.

name: Rockslide Ambush
oracle_text: Rockslide Ambush deals damage to target creature equal to the number of Mountains you control.

name: Sandstorm
oracle_text: Sandstorm deals 1 damage to each attacking creature.
flavor_text: Even the landscape turned against Sarsour, first rising up and pelting him, then rearranging itself so he could no longer find his way.

name: Scavenger Folk
oracle_text: {G}, {T}, Sacrifice Scavenger Folk: Destroy target artifact.

name: Sea Serpent
oracle_text:
Sea Serpent can't attack unless defending player controls an Island.
When you control no Islands, sacrifice Sea Serpent.
flavor_text: Legend has it that Serpents used to be bigger, but how could that be?

name: Serra Bestiary
oracle_text:
Enchant creature
At the beginning of your upkeep, sacrifice Serra Bestiary unless you pay {W}{W}.
Enchanted creature can't attack or block, and its activated abilities with {T} in their costs can't be activated.

name: Sleight of Hand
oracle_text: Look at the top two cards of your library. Put one of them into your hand and the other on the bottom of your library.

name: Soul Shred
oracle_text: Soul Shred deals 3 damage to target nonblack creature. You gain 3 life.

name: Southern Elephant
flavor_text: While defending their southern borders, both the Wu and Shu kingdoms fought against the barbarians' trained elephants.

name: Spotted Griffin
oracle_text: Flying
flavor_text: When the cat flies and the bird stalks, guard your horses carefully.

name: Staff of Zegon
oracle_text: {3}, {T}: Target creature gets -2/-0 until end of turn.
flavor_text: Though Mishra was impressed by the staves Ashnod had created for Zegon's defense, he understood they only hinted at her full potential.

name: Symbol of Unsummoning
oracle_text:
Return target creature to its owner's hand.
Draw a card.
flavor_text:
". . . inviting the soul to wander for a spell in abysses of solitude . . . ."
—Kate Chopin, The Awakening

name: Tablet of Epityr
oracle_text: Whenever an artifact you control is put into a graveyard from the battlefield, you may pay {1}. If you do, you gain 1 life.
flavor_text: Originally considered the work of Urza, this tablet was created by forgers seeking to imitate Urza's masterpieces.

name: Tawnos's Wand
oracle_text: {2}, {T}: Target creature with power 2 or less can't be blocked this turn.

name: Temple Acolyte
oracle_text: When Temple Acolyte enters the battlefield, you gain 3 life.
flavor_text: Young, yes. Inexperienced, yes. Weak? Don't count on it.

name: Terror
oracle_text: Destroy target nonartifact, nonblack creature. It can't be regenerated.

name: Urza's Chalice
oracle_text: Whenever a player casts an artifact spell, you may pay {1}. If you do, you gain 1 life.
flavor_text: When sorely wounded or tired, Urza would often retreat to the workshops of his apprentices. They were greatly amazed at how much better he looked each time he took a sip of water.

name: Urza's Mine
oracle_text: {T}: Add {C}. If you control an Urza's Power-Plant and an Urza's Tower, add {C}{C} instead.
flavor_text: Mines became common as cities during the days of the artificers.

name: Urza's Power Plant
oracle_text: {T}: Add {C}. If you control an Urza's Mine and an Urza's Tower, add {C}{C} instead.
flavor_text: Artifact construction requires immense resources.

name: Urza's Tower
oracle_text: {T}: Add {C}. If you control an Urza's Mine and an Urza's Power-Plant, add {C}{C}{C} instead.
flavor_text: Urza always put Tocasia's lessons on resource-gathering to effective use.

name: War Mammoth
oracle_text: Trample

name: Warp Artifact
oracle_text:
Enchant artifact
At the beginning of the upkeep of enchanted artifact's controller, Warp Artifact deals 1 damage to that player.

name: Weakness
oracle_text:
Enchant creature
Enchanted creature gets -2/-1.

name: Wild Aesthir
oracle_text:
Flying, first strike
{W}{W}: Wild Aesthir gets +2/+0 until end of turn. Activate only once each turn.
flavor_text:
"High in the Karplusans, death is swift and razor-clawed."
—Arna Kennerüd, skycaptain

name: Wild Griffin
oracle_text: Flying
flavor_text: Two little goblins, out in the sun. Down came a griffin, and then there was one.

name: Yotian Soldier
oracle_text: Vigilance
flavor_text: After Kroog was destroyed while most of its defenders were at his side, Urza vowed that none of his allies would ever need to fear for their own defense again, even while laying siege to a city far from their homes.
